snippet: The top United Nations human rights official warned Syrian opposition fighters that they would not be immune from prosecution for atrocities, like those that videos from Aleppo appeared to show.
abstract: Top United Nations human rights officials warn opposition fighters in Syria that they are not immune from prosecution for atrocities, as videos from city of Aleppo appear to show a mass execution by rebel fighters of bound and blindfolded Syrian government soldiers.

byline.contributor: Hala Droubi contributed reporting from Dubai, United Arab Emirates, and David D. Kirkpatrick from Cairo.

lead_paragraph: The top United Nations human rights official warned Syrian opposition fighters that they would not be immune from prosecution for atrocities, like those that videos from Aleppo appeared to show.

headline.seo: U.N. Warns Syrian Rebels Over Atrocities
headline.main: U.N. Official Warns Syrian Rebels About Atrocities
headline.print_headline: U.N. Official Warns Syrian Rebels About Atrocities
